requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 12
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel Core i5 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel Core i5 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel Core i5 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Open GL 1.5 capable graphics card.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel Core i5 3 GHz
